$comment: Category tracking registry for conformance fixture directories. Keep arrays sorted alphabetically.

untracked.attribution: Category not in manifest.json; needs manifest entry
untracked.crypto: Deterministic golden vectors (Ed25519 sign/verify); not fixture packs
untracked.discovery: Not yet audited for fixture pack hygiene
untracked.obligations: Duplicate fixture names in valid.json and invalid.json
untracked.parse: Single-receipt fixtures (v0.10.9+); tracked via expected_error/expected_variant in manifest.json, not fixture_count
untracked.stripe-crypto: Per-category manifest (v0.10.11+); uses profile-scoped manifest.json, not global fixture_count
untracked.verifier: New v0.10.8 fixtures; not yet tracked in manifest.json
untracked.workflow: fixture_count drift across multiple files; needs audit
untracked.x402: Single-receipt fixtures, not fixture packs; manifest not updated
